message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love. I'm asking for $175 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $150?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $150 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $160.  This would still be a good deal for both of us, and would allow me to make a fair profit. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'll be able to make a purchase if you're willing to sell at $150.
